captain-rex-officer.author: Fantasy Flight Games
captain-rex-officer.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
captain-rex-officer.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
captain-rex-officer.name: Captain Rex
captain-rex-officer.ability: :squadron:: You may choose 1 enemy ship at close range. That ship gains 1 raid token of your choice. While you are at distance 1-3 of an enemy ship, that ship can discard only 1 raid token of any type when it discards a command dial.
